title: Largest Area
description: Given N non-negative integers representing the histogram's bar height where the width of each bar is 1. Find the area of the largest rectangle in the histogram.

title: Staircase to success
description: You are N steps away from working in your dream company. You can either climb 1 step or 2 steps at a time. In how many distinct ways can you climb to the top where your Dream company is?

title: Largest Family
description: Ravi has a dream to be a King. One of the rule in his kingdom will be that for a couple to name their kids they have to choose only from certain number of alphabets.

title: Summation of Primes 1
description: You will be given a range L and R(inclusive). Find the summation of all prime numbers in this range.

title: Roomies
description: Sita and Gita are roomies. One of them always forgets to carry room's key and use to call the other for help. So, their friend Seema had a superb plan.
